message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get a bit more since I lose money over time.
Your offer was a bit too low for me, Alice.  This is a bit more balanced while acknowledging the time pressure.
Bob, my offer is still fair considering the inflation. Let's not waste time with more rounds.
Alice, this is getting silly.  We both lose out if this drags on. Let's split it evenly and call it a day.
